alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Ottawa (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 21 at 8:12PM CDT until June 22 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Kansas and north central Kansas, including the following counties, in central Kansas, Dickinson. In north central Kansas, Ottawa. * WHEN...Until 1115 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 811 PM CDT, emergency management reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. This is causing urban and small stream flooding in Abilene. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Abilene, Chapman, Solomon, Enterprise, Manchester, Moonlight and Talmage.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
